content: Overall, our first quarter results highlight the significant traction that is building within our business and gives us further confidence that we will deliver on our full-year financial expectations of achieving fiscal year 2022 revenues in excess of $300 million, adjusted EBITDA in excess of $50 million, net of $10 million of investments in growth initiatives that are incorporated in this EBITDA and free cash flow in excess of $70 million, excluding insurance proceeds, which have continued to get paid.
